definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
boat deck (upper deck on which lifeboats are stored)

sentences.english: The beach life-guards usually flag one another for communication.
sentences.chinese: 海滨救生员通常用旗号传达信息。

sentences.english: Your lifejacket is located under your seat or beneath your central arm rest.
sentences.chinese: 你的救生衣装在座位下或者中央扶手下面。

sentences.english: Now the lifeguards have all gone home.
sentences.chinese: 现在救生员全都回家了。

sentences.english: Hundreds of specially trained dogs form Italy's corps of canine lifeguards.
sentences.chinese: 目前意大利共有数百只受过特训的救生犬。

sentences.english: I'm a little scared. Do you offer the lifebuoy for us?
sentences.chinese: 我有点怕了，你们救生圈吗？

sentences.english: More weeks of life-saving Church, I wish everyone good health.
sentences.chinese: 愈周救生堂，祝愿人人身体健康。

sentences.english: Climb down nets, and embark the lifeboat over manropes, everyone.
sentences.chinese: 每个人爬下救生网，用扶手绳登上救生艇。

sentences.english: Climb down nets, and embark the lifeboat over manropes, everyone.
sentences.chinese: 每个人爬下救生网，用扶手绳登上救生艇。

sentences.english: The utility of this rescue equipment has still to be assessed in a real emergency.
sentences.chinese: 这种救生设备的功用还有待在真正的紧急情况中评定。

sentences.english: The lifeboat brought off all the crew.
sentences.chinese: 救生船把船上所有船员都救了出来。

sentences.english: The life boat slowly drifted away from the sinking ship.
sentences.chinese: 救生船慢慢地从下沉的船旁边漂走。

sentences.english: The lifeguard helps Dan out of the water.
sentences.chinese: 救生员帮助丹恩回到岸上。

sentences.english: Replace lifeboat container in next port.
sentences.chinese: 下一港更换救生艇柜子。

sentences.english: Please repaint all the life buoys of our ship.
sentences.chinese: 请把我轮所有的救生圈重新油漆。

sentences.english: Tom's lifejacket had failed to inflate.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆的救生衣未能充气。

definition: ventilator (artificial breathing apparatus used in hospitals)
